1.name: Doha
1.description: Doha is the capital city and most populous city of the State of Qatar

2.name: Hofuf
2.description: Al-Hofuf is the major urban center in the Al-Ahsa Oasis in the Eastern Province of Saudi Arabia

3.name: Gassim
3.description: Gassim airport, also known as Prince Nayef bin Abdulaziz Regional Airport

4.name: Luxor
4.description: Luxor is a city in Upper (southern) Egypt and the capital of Luxor Governorate

5.name: Agadir
5.description: Agadir is a major city in Morocco, located on the shore of the Atlantic Ocean, near the foot of the Atlas Mountains

6.name: Atlanta
6.description: Atlanta is the capital of and the most populous city in the U.S. state of Georgia, with an estimated 2013 population of 447,841

7.name: Dallas
7.description: Dallas is a major city in the state of Texas and is the largest urban center of the fourth most populous metropolitan area in the United States

8.name: Albuquerque
8.description: Albuquerque is the most populous city in the U.S. state of New Mexico

9.name: Phoenix
9.description: Phoenix is the capital, and largest city, of the U.S. state of Arizona

10.name: Los Angeles
10.description: Los Angeles is the second-largest city in the United States, known as a major center of the American entertainment industry
